column1: I am definitely going to start watching Mistresses again this summer.
Starts June 2nd… I ended up liking the show… It was a decent summer show
Olivier seems like he’d have a great moan voice.
Why is he flirting with her now that she has a girlfriend?
IDK why people think if you’re bi and are dating someone of the same sex then sleep with the opposite sex it’s not cheating?Â
